Quick guide to LAN setup:

  1. Copy your ksp directory to the other machine.
  2. Put the samv_server folder in GameData on one of them.
  3. Put the samv_client folder in GameData on the other.
  4. Start ksp on the server. On the main menu, click the samv button and enter the ip address of the client. Leave the port settings alone.
  5. Start ksp on the client. On the main menu, click the samv button and enter the ip address of the server. Leave the port setting alone.
  6. Start the game on the server.
  7. The client should sync up. Once it does, click "start map view"

If that doesn't work, then it could be firewall or connectivity issues, or a bug I don't know about. Post your KSP logs from both the client and server and I'll take a look.
